channel.title: Projects on Giacomo Cordoni
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Giacomo Cordoni

item.title: Galactic archeology through Very Metal-Poor stars
item.description: Very Metal-Poor stara are very rare objects and they are key ingredients for the understanding of the formation of the Milky Way, offering a unique perspective into the earliest phases of our infant Galaxy.

item.title: Dynamics of Multiple Stellar Populations in Old Globular clusters
item.description: The presence and origin of Multiple stellar populations in Globular Clusters is one of the greatest mysteries of modern astrophysics.

item.title: Galactic Open clusters
item.description: Our reserach proved that nearby young clusters exhibits an extended main-sequence turnoff and a broadened main sequence. This is the first evidence of multiple stellar populations in a Galactic open cluster.

item.title: Young Magellanic Clouds clusters
item.description: The discovery of multiple populations in young and intermediate-age clusters has been one of the major findings in the field of stellar populations of the last decade.

item.title: GALFOR
item.description: GALFOR is an ERC funded project of Galactic archaeology (ERC-2016-STG, 716082) to address such hot topics of modern astrophysics
